website_summaries.verdict: The New Balance FuelCell Echo is a road running shoe that’s built for neutral runners. Composed of durable and reliable materials, it delivers an ultra-responsive cushioning and superb traction. Achieve a good balance of fashion and functionality with the FuelCell Echo.
pros: Many claim that the New Balance FuelCell Echo improves speed
A lot state that it is very comfortable
It has a lightweight composition, remarked several athletes
Several hail the responsive ride the shoe delivers
cons: Some of the wearers say that the shoe caused some blisters on the foot
A few customers have raised some concerns about the fit of the shoe

customer_reviews.title: Longer thicker socks are a must
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look great. They fit as expected, and they are fairly comfy. There's only one problem and it's a major one - the collar above the ankle digs into the back of you leg. I received the shoe yesterday and went on a 4 mile walk. It was one of the worst walking experiences of my life. The pain kept me distracted from the errands I was running. I was bleeding and am now sore from the weird gait I had to adopt in order to limit the pain. I'll be getting thicker socks to see if they work. Overall, I'm disappointed in New Balance for their poorly designed product. I wish I spent the $100 elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Good running shoe
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been training up for a half marathon and run exclusively in ASIC Kayanos. I had been wanting a second shoe to be able to rotate them. Saw these on a shoe sight and they were supposedly similar to the kayanos. Paid like 59$ for the white with yellow and just gave them their first run. 5 miles. Felt good. Felt like they have less cushion than I’m used to and less stability but honestly I have no complaints. Especially at the price.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic comfort. Like a well fitted slipper. Very flexible, light feeling (although not crazy light on the scale) and breathe well. Coming from Hokas, there is a LOT more ground contact feel which makes sense given the reduced stack height. I would say that the increased ground feel encourages me to stay on my toes/mid foot and avoid a heel strike. Like other commenters have mentioned, the heel cup rises high in the back so half sock wearers may feel a rub on their Achilles. seems to be all the rage these days across multiple brands to have high heel cups. Looks snazzy but too often doesn’t fit the foot and Achilles very well.
customer_reviews.author: Bbarnes

customer_reviews.title: They hurt my ankles
customer_reviews.text: I was determined to get these shoes after trying them on in the mall and not finding my size ANYWHERE but on amazon. Got them in 1 day. Wore them to work with ankle socks and the shoe irritated my ankles so I had to run home and put on long socks. I thought that would help but it didn’t its a really comfortable shoe but tore the back of my ankles up!! I have to find something to cushion the shoe from rubbing so bad
customer_reviews.author: salina bryant

customer_reviews.title: Nice NB shoes to wear for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Good grip on the bottom, stretchy fit is what I needed. This should help me walk and run whenever I can. I have a pair of Brooks Grit 7, they're good shoes but they don't seem to put up pretty well like those should. But this is recommended though.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, very comfortable. Wear them when standing on my feet for several hours and feet do not hurt.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wicks

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite running show of all time. Wide option is why I chose new balance and this is the only shoe that fits so perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H.

customer_reviews.title: Good pair
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and stylish. Only hang up is the heel portion that needs to be sanded smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Jr

customer_reviews.title: New Balance
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the wrong size so I had to send them back, but I loved the style of the shoe
customer_reviews.author: tanica11

customer_reviews.title: not cushioned
customer_reviews.text: Inner sole for all intents and purposes was no more cushioning than a piece of cardboard. Had to buy innersoles in order to prevent knee pain while walking on the treadmill
customer_reviews.author: ElBE

customer_reviews.title: Their "wide" isn't very wide
customer_reviews.text: My son wears a size 9 wide. I ordered the 9 2E but they were basically the same width as regular shoes. We had to send them back. :(
customer_reviews.author: Katie W

customer_reviews.title: Ok shoe in the $60 range
customer_reviews.text: The hold is pretty loose in regards to how it holds your feet. Toe box too big. I have wider feet also. Makes me feel unstable.
customer_reviews.author: Pat M

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes for the cost
customer_reviews.text: These run about 1 half sizes too large. Highly recommend getting a sole insert. Makes a nice value shoe feel like a top performance shoe.
customer_reviews.author: brandon digital

customer_reviews.title: Blisters!
customer_reviews.text: There is a very sharp, high heel that blisters and scratches all the skin around your Achilles.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable feel but without higher socks these shoes rub on the achilles and outer ankle. User error but still good to figure out the hard way that they will rub. A light pair of shoes this would be great pair of shoes for track work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t believe the sizing chart.
customer_reviews.text: The sizing chart recommended a size 10, which is smaller than I typically wear, so I second guessed this and went with a 10.5. This turned out to be too small as well. Returned this pair and reordered in a size 11. Very happy with the shoe. Almost as comfortable as a pair of slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Pyle

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are pretty awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected and looks as awesome as I'd hoped!
customer_reviews.author: Z. Stroeher

customer_reviews.title: **Warning this is a fake New Balance**
customer_reviews.text: This is a fake product. Material is cheap, mesh/foam. The right shoe is already tearing before I even tried it on. Do not waste your time even considering these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive but very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the look of these shoes but darn does the elastic around the top scratch my ankle a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: They are lighter and more comfortable than I imagined. Excellent shoes so far. I did purchase 1/2 size larger.
customer_reviews.author: William davis

customer_reviews.title: Almost a Perfect Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about the shoe... BUT the heel cup is a little deep and extends too far up the achilles. If you wear ankle socks beware, it can rub and become uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Scrotar

customer_reviews.title: The feel, comfort and style
customer_reviews.text: This sneaker fits and feel great, its look even more fabulous. Its my second pair of New Balance sneakers, and I'm not disappointed. It's great for jogging and indoor work out. What else can I say, its just a great sneakers to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Dawkins

customer_reviews.title: breathable upper and responsive
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable upper. Midsole is responsive and the outsole is super gripping like a basketball shoe!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: You can trust this company in knowing your getting what you ordered.
customer_reviews.text: I’m on my feet all day and these are some comfortable sneakers that look cool. They are light as light can be. Fabric top let’s the air in and out, very little sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Ranger1069

customer_reviews.title: Nice color nice product
customer_reviews.text: Just got my new balance, but the size is too small. I got size 11 instead of size 12. What can I do?
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe, not only to run in, but also for every day wear.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan U

customer_reviews.title: Look good feel good
customer_reviews.text: Look great, feel great. Have to wear higher socks though, the back can irritate achillies if I don’t. Other than that, solid comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ulices Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Sloppy toe box
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is really smooth. But, it has a really sloppy toe box.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Fraud
customer_reviews.text: The model IS NOT FuelCell Rebel V1, is FuelCell Echo
customer_reviews.author: Diego Delfino

customer_reviews.title: Best pair of sports shoes in a while
customer_reviews.text: I have become a fan of these shoes in a short period of time. I have been using them since past couple of months. They are super comfortable. I wear them on the morning jog for 5km and then most other times. Very comfortable to walk. I was using skeachers and reebok since last few years and always had some strain in my foot. I used to think that is because one of my foot is larger than the other.(which might be true) . With this shoes, I am super happy. So much so i want to buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Sajid Ali Baig

customer_reviews.title: Outperforming Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These shows are very light, breathable, and contour to my foot perfectly. I was a little worried using New Balance as a running shoes but was pleasantly surprised once I put a few hundred miles on them! They are one of the best pairs of shoes I have ever worn!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Confy and well made. NB hitting to perfect shoes for almost every sport game.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Snug Fit
customer_reviews.text: These are really light weight and snap onto your foot so well. The fabric is breathable and at no moment did I feel uncomfortable in these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Harsh Pathak

customer_reviews.title: I’ll be testing them
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t get a good first impression because i have another new balance shoes that are more comfortable but i’ll be trying them with another insole Update so far no complaints now i like them
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful.shoe The last 3 pairs I have Bought have been New Balance.. Watch out Nike..
customer_reviews.author: Ret.SGM H Roman

customer_reviews.title: Slightly large forefoot area
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is comfortable and the fit is good. The forefoot is a little large and causes the foot to move around more than other New Balance shoes. Developed a small blister on the outside at the ball of the foot.
customer_reviews.author: Virgil

product_meta.title: New Balance Men's Mfcecsk Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Sport Type: Running Color: Black Shoe Size: 44
